title: Spacious 1 bed on Harrison Ave w/No rental fee, laundry in unit, 10/1
posting_body: Super value for this 1 bed on Harrison ave in Chinatwon.
The unit is getting renovated in august with a brand new kitchen, stainless steel appliances.
Near Tufts medical, Orange line, Walk to downtown crossing, south end.
Washer and dryer in the unit
Unit is getting renovated with a new kitchen and stainless steel appliances and will be ready for move-in date
